alert.note: Alert for Blackford; Grant (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:01PM EDT until August 17 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL GRANT AND NORTHERN BLACKFORD COUNTIES... At 700 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Montpelier to near Upland to near Marion, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Montpelier, Roll, Lake Wood, and Arcana. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 262 and 265. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
